alert.note: Alert for Eastern Alaska Range (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 2:15PM AKST until February 24 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM AKST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 65 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Alaska Range. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 6 AM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause extensive damage to trees and power lines. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snowfall south of Trims Camp.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
